headline.main: UN Torture Expert: No Visit to Guantanamo Before Terms Ends
headline.print_headline: UN Torture Expert: No Visit to Guantanamo Before Terms Ends

docs.snippet: The U.N.'s special representative on torture expects he will end his six-year term without visiting the U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba....
docs.lead_paragraph: The U.N.'s special representative on torture expects he will end his six-year term without visiting the U.S. military prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.

headline.main: Scientists Say Study Was Misinterpreted in Red Wolf Decision
headline.print_headline: Scientists Say Study Was Misinterpreted in Red Wolf Decision

docs.snippet: Four scientists cited in a decision to scale back the only wild population of red wolves say the government misinterpreted their work, according to a letter released Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Four scientists cited in a decision to scale back the only wild population of red wolves say the government misinterpreted their work, according to a letter released Tuesday.

headline.main: In Mosul, Residents Report New Terrors as Iraqi Forces Near
headline.print_headline: In Mosul, Residents Report New Terrors as Iraqi Forces Near

docs.snippet: On the eerily quiet streets of Mosul, fighters from the Islamic State group are killing suspected spies, blocking roads and planting bombs ahead of a showdown with Iraqi forces....
docs.lead_paragraph: On the eerily quiet streets of Mosul, fighters from the Islamic State group are killing suspected spies, blocking roads and planting bombs ahead of a showdown with Iraqi forces.

headline.main: Woosnam, Love, Ochoa, Mallon Chosen for Hall of Fame
headline.print_headline: Woosnam, Love, Ochoa, Mallon Chosen for Hall of Fame

docs.snippet: Ian Woosnam, Davis Love III, Meg Mallon and Lorena Ochoa have been selected for the World Golf Hall of Fame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Ian Woosnam, Davis Love III, Meg Mallon and Lorena Ochoa have been selected for the World Golf Hall of Fame.

headline.main: Yemen Houthis Back Truce, U.N., U.S. Call for Aid to Flow
headline.print_headline: Yemen Houthis Back Truce, U.N., U.S. Call for Aid to Flow

docs.snippet: Yemen's Houthi-run administration welcomed a 72-hour ceasefire  starting on Wednesday intended to allow aid to reach areas cut off by months of fighting and in dire humanitarian need....
docs.lead_paragraph: Yemen's Houthi-run administration welcomed a 72-hour ceasefire  starting on Wednesday intended to allow aid to reach areas cut off by months of fighting and in dire humanitarian need.

headline.main: Pence Visits Firebombed Office, Defends 'Rigged' Claims
headline.print_headline: Pence Visits Firebombed Office, Defends 'Rigged' Claims

docs.snippet: Republican vice presidential hopeful Mike Pence is condemning the firebombing of a North Carolina Republican campaign office as an "act of political terrorism."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Republican vice presidential hopeful Mike Pence is condemning the firebombing of a North Carolina Republican campaign office as an "act of political terrorism."

headline.main: Astronaut Describes Career Detour to US Health Director
headline.print_headline: Astronaut Describes Career Detour to US Health Director

docs.snippet: Kate Rubins applied to be an astronaut while she was procrastinating about writing a grant application to the National Institutes of Health....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kate Rubins applied to be an astronaut while she was procrastinating about writing a grant application to the National Institutes of Health.

headline.main: Authorities: Florida Teen Dies After Weekend Beating Attack
headline.print_headline: Authorities: Florida Teen Dies After Weekend Beating Attack

docs.snippet: Authorities say a 15-year-old boy who was attacked and beaten in an upscale suburb near Orlando, Florida, has died in a hospital....
docs.lead_paragraph: Authorities say a 15-year-old boy who was attacked and beaten in an upscale suburb near Orlando, Florida, has died in a hospital.

headline.main: 2 Drivers in Lincoln Tunnel Bus Crash Taken Off the Road
headline.print_headline: 2 Drivers in Lincoln Tunnel Bus Crash Taken Off the Road

docs.snippet: Two New Jersey Transit bus drivers whose vehicles collided in the Lincoln Tunnel last month have been taken off the road while the agency investigates the accident....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two New Jersey Transit bus drivers whose vehicles collided in the Lincoln Tunnel last month have been taken off the road while the agency investigates the accident.

headline.main: Bank Leumi to Pay $1.6 Million Over 'Unregistered' Cross-Border Business
headline.print_headline: Bank Leumi to Pay $1.6 Million Over 'Unregistered' Cross-Border Business

docs.snippet: Bank Leumi will pay $1.6 million and admit to wrongdoing to settle civil charges that it provided investment advice and solicited investments from U.S. customers for more than a decade without registering with federal regulators, U.S. authorities ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Bank Leumi will pay $1.6 million and admit to wrongdoing to settle civil charges that it provided investment advice and solicited investments from U.S. customers for more than a decade without registering with federal regulators, U.S. authorities said on Tuesday.
